text: 🚨NEW DATA🚨 On April 15th, protesters descended onto Lansing for "Operation Gridlock" to protest Michigan's stay-at-home order. Cell phone location data shows that after gathering with minimal protection, protestors fanned out to small communities and areas hard-hit by #COVID19. https://t.co/3gW8YnNljm
